species.name: mamoswine
descriptions: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
A frozen one was dug up from soil dating back 10,000 years. It woke up to much amazement.
It flourished worldwide during the ice age but its population declined when the masses of ice began to dwindle.
It looks strong, and that’s exactly what it is. As the weather grows colder, its ice tusks grow longer, thicker, and more impressive.
Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

abilities.name: oblivious
abilities.effect: Prevents infatuation and protects against captivate.

abilities.name: snow-cloak
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.
